Text:
Thanks again for all your hard work 2040. Is there any chance you could upload the old BBC drama Ghostwatch? I've been trying to find it everywhere. 
Also, I know you've been having trouble with British tv programmes. Does this mean you will not be able to upload the new series of Doctor Who and Ashes to Ashes? They both begin in March I think. Anyway thanks so much either way.
can u encode Storm Warriors 2 please?
nevermind what i said 2040,i've got it now,thanks for all yur rips

@mattbdon: Does this rings a bell?

"Additional Info:

Ghostwatch was a controversial British horror-mockumentary television movie which was produced by the BBC and aired on BBC One on October 31 (Halloween), 1992. The 90-minute film was a horror story shot in a documentary style and appeared as part of BBC Drama's Screen One series. It involved BBC reporters performing a live, on-air investigation of a house in Northolt, Greater London at which poltergeist activity was believed to be taking place.

TV-Series    Drama    Horror"

If this is the right one? I have it now and can be up in the evening. So... let me know.
That's it! Thanks loads it's very good from what I remember.
